thread.title: Ground News - Popular smoothie blender recalled
thread.title_full: Ground News - Popular smoothie blender recalled

author: Boston Herald
title: Ground News - Popular smoothie blender recalled
text:
Summary by Boston Herald BlendJet is recalling about 4.8 million of its portable blenders over laceration and fire hazards after receiving dozens of reports of injuries, federal regulators said Thursday. BlendJet 2 Portable Blenders can overheat or catch fire, according to a notice from the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission, and their blender blades can break off during use. There have been 329 reports of blades breaking during use to date, the CPSC said, as well … Share menu More
